00002  * Cache line
00003  * Size is a specified number of bytes
00004  * Also contains state of line (per line state)
00005  ******************************************************************************/
00006 #include "cacheLine.h"
00007 #include <stdio.h>

00010 CacheLine::CacheLine ()
00011 {
00012     _valid = false;
00013     _dirty = false;
00014     _tag = -1;
00015     _lineSize = 8; //[Bytes] 64b cache line to support double
00016     _data = new int8_t[_lineSize];
00017     for (int i = 0; i < _lineSize; i++) {_data[i] = 0;}
00018     if(!_data){
00019         //throw Fwk::MemoryException("Alloc failed in CacheLine::CacheLine"); //TODO fix this
00020     }
00021     debug = false;
00022 }
00023 
00024 CacheLine::~CacheLine () {
00025     delete [] _data;
00026 }
